001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo;
002
003/**
004 * An entry for a JSON-RPC method in a {@code help} response.
005 */
006public class MethodHelpEntry {
007    private final String methodName;
008    private final String methodParametersHelp;
009
010    /**
011     * Create an entry from a text line in the help response
012     * @param entryLine A text line with the method name optionally followed by a space and parameter help info
013     */
014    public MethodHelpEntry(String entryLine) {
015        this(entryLine.split(" ", 2));
016    }
017
018    /**
019     * Create an entry from an array of 1 or 2 strings
020     * @param components method name in {@code components[0]}, if {@code length == 2}, parameter help in {@code components[1]}
021     */
022    public MethodHelpEntry(String[] components) {
023        this(components[0], components.length >= 2 ? components[1] : "");
024    }
025
026    /**
027     * Create an entry from method name and parameter help
028     * @param methodName name of RPC method
029     * @param methodParametersHelp help for method parameters or {@code ""}
030     */
031    public MethodHelpEntry(String methodName, String methodParametersHelp) {
032        this.methodName = methodName;
033        this.methodParametersHelp = methodParametersHelp;
034    }
035
036    public String getMethodName() {
037        return methodName;
038    }
039
040    public String getMethodParametersHelp() {
041        return methodParametersHelp;
042    }
043}
